ygData.subject: Avoiding the Storm
ygData.msgSnippet: What does that mean now, we re related? Teltoli fought hard to stop herself from smiling at that last sarcastic comment. After saying they should go home,

From: steph_teltoli@...

"What does that mean now, we're related?"

Teltoli fought hard to stop herself from smiling at that last 
sarcastic comment. After saying they should go home, Teltoli let a 
sincere smile break loose, and she watched Carnage walk a few steps. 
The Fuzor turned back to Instrat.

"I realize that last attack was for my sake, but you needn't think I 
need protection from Carnage. We just had a few misunderstandings, 
but we both sorted it out. Although I'm.. thankful for your help 
towards me, just.. you don't need to go around killing everything 
that you think you should" She softly, trying to be friendly. 

Maybe fighting wasn't the best tactic after all. Even though she did 
so hate the sounds of battle. "I'm sure you could make friends, in 
whatever faction you are, if you decided to not be so.. savage" She 
smiled, hoping to be reassuring. 

'Oh God, what am I doing? I'm trying to be friendly with someone that 
tried to kill us not an hour ago?' Teltoli thought. She took a few 
steps back, waved goodbye to Instrat and hoped she heeded her words.

When she reached Carnage, she stayed in her bot mode. Sometimes some 
height was nice. She had a look of shock on her face.

"Did I really do that?" She grimaced, and thought that maybe her 
mother's traits were coming through in her more strongly than ever 
now.
